articles.title: Beyoncé’s ‘Break My Soul’ is a sign the Great Resignation 'has seeped into the zeitgeist,' says labor economist - CNBC
articles.description: Beyoncé released a new single, "Break My Soul," on Monday. The song taps into the worker malaise that led a record number of Americans to quit their jobs.
articles.content:
Beyoncé released a new single, "Break My Soul," on Monday. The song references quitting a job and employee stress, alluding to the recent Great Resignation trend.
